name.description: title or name of the club, team or association

period.description: duration of this position at the club, team or association

start.description: date started at club / team / association. Can be related to position

end.description: date ended at club / team / association. Can be related to position

position.description: position held at the club, team or association

summary.description: description of experience at the club, team or association

url.description: URL address for the club, team or association
